trans-unit.source: This book, the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citref"></ph></cite>, provides reference information about <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>. It covers <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>'s SQL language, the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> implementation of JDBC, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> system catalogs, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> error messages, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> properties, and SQL keywords.
